channel.title: My background is messed up - help!
channel.description:
Hey guys my background is messed up and i cant figure out how to fix it if anyone knows how I'll be very grateful
http://prntscr.com/14z6m4
htp://prntscr.com/14z6m4

item.title: My background is messed up - help!
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:8, topic:519288”]If you come here for help, you act courteous and grateful. Dishing out offensive comments will not only turn the community against you, it’ll also land you a moderation and you most likely won’t receive any help.

So, for today’s lesson everybody, we learnt that being kind and courteous has great benefits for all![/quote]
Yet you still don’t remove the offer of payment. :rolleyes:

Read full topic
item.source: My background is messed up - help!

item.title: My background is messed up - help!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

If you come here for help, you act courteous and grateful. Dishing out offensive comments will not only turn the community against you, it’ll also land you a moderation and you most likely won’t receive any help.

So, for today’s lesson everybody, we learnt that being kind and courteous has great benefits for all!

item.title: My background is messed up - help!
item.dc:creator: @pingisme pingisme
item.description:
@pingisme wrote:

[quote=“IHitSpecs, post:6, topic:519288”][quote author=pingisme link=topic=637751.msg4298765#msg4298765 date=1368644492]

If you cannot act mature in the help section especially when you are the one asking for help then why should anybody help you whatsoever?

Also, if you noticed I said

most likely

Edit: after looking at your other topics it appears you have a canny ability to ask for help then don’t appreciate it when you are given advice that just so happens to be incorrect/only partially helpful.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,603483.msg4222937.html#msg4222937

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,603062.msg4222147.html#msg4222147

If you cannot act accordingly as a moparian should perhaps you should leave this community and go elsewhere. We don’t want your kind here.

love yeah i do what i want and don’t tell me what to do you little worthless worm mother loveer leering around on this forums like its gonna get you some where gtfo your ass and do something
[/quote]
OMG XD I’M DYING THIS IS THE FUNNIEST THING I HAVE EVER READ XD. No. Just No.[/quote]
yeah i know this kids trying to fuck me in pm im like no fag
